string.value: #bDad#k seems to have something else he wants to ask you to do. Talk to Dad.

Another #p1013200# ran away while the fence was broken. Go to the #b#m900020100##k and bring back the lost #p1013200#. #rYou must be careful as the recent rain storms may have destroyed the paths#k.


#i4032449# #t4032449# #b#c4032449# / 1#k
While searching for the #p1013200#, you found a strange egg. How will you raise this egg?
Oh no! A #b#p1013200##k ran away while the fence was broken. He's too young to find his way home, so we'll have to go find him. Do you think you can help me?
I think the #p1013200# ran towards the #b#m900020100##k. Please head there to look for the #p1013200#.
The Lush Forest is towards the #bupper left#k. The recent flood washed away much of the path, so be careful.
Hmm. #p1013101# would have volunteered to do it even before I asked.
That took a while. The #p1013200# must ran pretty far. \r\n#L0##bEr, yeah. Sure... Dad, is there a strange foggy forest around here?#l\n#k
A foggy forest? I don't think so. It's always clear around Henesys.\r\n#L0##b(Strange. Did you have another dream? What's going on... )#k#l\n#k
Anyway, thanks for your help. Er, Evan? What has you so lost in thought? \r\n#L0##b#b(Wait, what's this? This is the egg from earlier! Then...it wasn't a dream?!)#k#l\n#k
Evan?\r\n#L0##bDad! Quick! How do I get an egg to hatch?!#l\n#k
Whoa! You scared me! You want to know how to hatch an egg? Why are you asking such a stange question...?
I don't know how to hatch an egg... Maybe your mother would know.
You didn't find that #p1013200# yet? It's probably around the #m900020100# somewhere. You can enter the Lush Forest by heading to your #bupper left#k.
